attributes.additional_details: There has been a 1.5% for the fire service, 3% for the NHS BUT 0%for the police services having the utmost devastating effect on our police services morale. Police are no longer feeling valued or respected for all the dedicated hard work that they do. The police are risking their lives on a daily basis & they don't even get a promise of a payrise? Therefore it is only right the government does the right thing by giving our heroic police force the rightly so payrise.
attributes.background: To protect our protectors & give our police service the long overdue payrise they so deserve. Who constantly put their lives in danger to protect ours.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580694
